description: man flanked by two women on lower half of card; angelic figure framed by a depiction of the sun on top half of card aims an arrow downward toward the figures; Roman numeral VI printed on top border and LAMOUREUX on bottom; from a deck of 78 hand-colored triumph playing cards
provenance:
'Lady Charlotte Elizabeth Schrieber, 1812-1895, London [1]. Carl A. Weyerhaeuser, Minneapolis (by 1937); given to MIA, 1996.

1. Note with deck states: "Swiss Tarot. / Complete 78 Cards / from Schreiber Collection"
title: The Lovers
